add.title: Pair your robot
add.press_home:
1. Place your robot in the dock.

2. Press the Home button on your robot until it starts beeping.

Connecting can take up to 10 seconds.

error.unknown: Something went wrong, please try again.
error.duplicate_device: This device is already added to Homey.
error.create_device_unknown: Something went wrong, this device could not be added to Homey.
error.in_use: Someone or something is currently connected to your robot. Please remove this connection and try again.
error.password_timeout: Could not authenticate with this robot, please try again.
error.spot_cleaning: Spot cleaning is only possible by pressing the button on your robot.
